Package seng202.group2.view.graphs

Class BooleanGraphOption

java.lang.Object
seng202.group2.view.graphs.GraphOption
seng202.group2.view.graphs.BooleanGraphOption
public class BooleanGraphOption
extends GraphOption
A graph option which can either be enabled, or disabled.
Author:
Connor Dunlop

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  BooleanGraphOption.StateChangeListener
    A simple functional interface stub to facilitate use of lambda expressions for method addChangeListener.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addChangeListener​(BooleanGraphOption.StateChangeListener onChangeFunction)
    Adds a function to be called when a change in the state of the option occurs.
    javafx.scene.Node getRoot()
    Gets the root node of the option GUI.
    java.lang.Boolean getState()
    Checks whether the option is enabled or not.
    java.lang.String getValidityMessage()
    Returns a string describing the state of the option.
    boolean requirementsMet()
    A BooleanGraphOption has no invalid state for plotting, so always return true.
    void setState​(java.lang.Boolean state)
    Sets the state of the option to enabled if state true, disabled if state false.

  • Method Details

    • setState

      public void setState​(java.lang.Boolean state)
      Sets the state of the option to enabled if state true, disabled if state false.
      Parameters:
      state - True to set the option state to enabled, false to set the option state to disabled.

    • getState

      public java.lang.Boolean getState()
      Checks whether the option is enabled or not.
      Returns:
      True if the option is enabled, false otherwise.

    • addChangeListener

      public void addChangeListener​(BooleanGraphOption.StateChangeListener onChangeFunction)
      Adds a function to be called when a change in the state of the option occurs.
      Parameters:
      onChangeFunction - A lambda function which takes no arguments, and returns no parameters.

    • getRoot

      public javafx.scene.Node getRoot()
      Description copied from class: GraphOption
      Gets the root node of the option GUI. This root node is used to display the option in the option pane.
      Specified by:
      getRoot in class GraphOption
      Returns:
      A root node whose children display, and allow the user to interact with, this graph option.

    • requirementsMet

      public boolean requirementsMet()
      A BooleanGraphOption has no invalid state for plotting, so always return true.
      Specified by:
      requirementsMet in class GraphOption
      Returns:
      true

    • getValidityMessage

      public java.lang.String getValidityMessage()
      Description copied from class: GraphOption
      Returns a string describing the state of the option. This description should include information about the validity of the option's configuration.
      Specified by:
      getValidityMessage in class GraphOption
      Returns:
      A string describing the option's state, with regard to validity.
